CHENGGUANG XU (许程广)

805 Columbus Ave, Boston, MA 02120 · (617) 407-6168 · xu.cheng@northeastern.edu

I am currently a Ph.D. student, co-advised by Prof. Christopher Amato and Prof. Lawson Wong, in Khoury College of Computer Sciences at Northeastern University.

My current research interests are deep learning, deep reinforcement learning, and computer vision. In particular, I am interested in designing algorithms that can improve the learning efficiency and task-specific generalization in robotic tasks (E.g., Visual navigation).
